name: gbopos

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cgbo), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, cgbow))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ GoldbachOdd, c0 ∈ ℕ, c0 ∈ GoldbachOddW)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cgbo), wcel(c0, cn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cgbo), wcel(c0, cgbow))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cgbow), wcel(c0, cn))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ GoldbachOdd → c0 ∈ ℕ)
⊣ (c0 ∈ GoldbachOdd → c0 ∈ GoldbachOddW)
⊣ (c0 ∈ GoldbachOddW → c0 ∈ ℕ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cgbo), wcel(c0, cn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cgbo), wcel(c0, cgbow))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cgbow), wcel(c0, cn))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ GoldbachOdd → c0 ∈ ℕ)
⊣ (c0 ∈ GoldbachOdd → c0 ∈ GoldbachOddW)
⊣ (c0 ∈ GoldbachOddW → c0 ∈ ℕ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cgbo), wcel(c0, cn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cgbow), wcel(c0, cn))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ GoldbachOdd → c0 ∈ ℕ)
⊣ (c0 ∈ GoldbachOddW → c0 ∈ ℕ)

comment: Any odd Goldbach number is positive. (Contributed by AV, 26-Jul-2020.)
